body:
Thank you for the feedback! I reverted most updates to allow Renovate to do most of the work but kept those that required snapshot updates (katex) or code changes (@pmmmwh/react-refresh-webpack-plugin). I also kept the Renovate config change that adds express-graphql to the <1.0.0-minor group to avoid merging breaking changes from that module in the future. Finally, I cherrypicked updates for chokidar, webpack, whatwg-fetch, and a few dependencies of gatsby-telemetry.

Here is a table of the included updates:

Package | Type | Update | Change
-- | -- | -- | --
[@pmmmwh/react-refresh-webpack-plugin](https://togithub.com/pmmmwh/react-refresh-webpack-plugin) | dependencies | minor | [`^0.3.3` -> `^0.4.1`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/@pmmmwh%2freact-refresh-webpack-plugin/0.3.3/0.4.1)
[@pmmmwh/react-refresh-webpack-plugin](https://togithub.com/pmmmwh/react-refresh-webpack-plugin) | devDependencies | minor | [`^0.3.3` -> `^0.4.1`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/@pmmmwh%2freact-refresh-webpack-plugin/0.3.3/0.4.1)
[chokidar](https://togithub.com/paulmillr/chokidar) | dependencies | patch | [`3.4.0` -> `^3.4.2`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/chokidar/3.4.0/3.4.2)
[chokidar](https://togithub.com/paulmillr/chokidar) | devDependencies | patch | [`^3.4.0` -> `^3.4.2`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/chokidar/3.4.0/3.4.2)
[envinfo](https://togithub.com/tabrindle/envinfo) | dependencies | minor | [`^7.5.1` -> `^7.7.3`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/envinfo/7.5.1/7.7.3)
[eslint-plugin-react](https://togithub.com/yannickcr/eslint-plugin-react) | dependencies | patch | [`^7.20.2` -> `^7.20.6`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/eslint-plugin-react/7.20.2/7.20.6)
[eslint-plugin-react](https://togithub.com/yannickcr/eslint-plugin-react) | devDependencies | patch | [`^7.20.2` -> `^7.20.6`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/eslint-plugin-react/7.20.2/7.20.6)
[git-up](https://togithub.com/IonicaBizau/git-up) | dependencies | patch | [`4.0.1` -> `^4.0.2`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/git-up/4.0.1/4.0.2)
[is-docker](https://togithub.com/sindresorhus/is-docker) | dependencies | minor | [`2.0.0` -> `^2.1.1`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/is-docker/2.0.0/2.1.1)
[katex](https://katex.org/) ([source](https://togithub.com/KaTeX/KaTeX)) | devDependencies | minor | [`^0.11.1` -> `^0.12.0`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/katex/0.11.1/0.12.0)
[webpack](https://togithub.com/webpack/webpack) | dependencies | minor | [`~4.43.0` -> `^4.44.1`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/webpack/4.43.0/4.44.1)
[webpack](https://togithub.com/webpack/webpack) | devDependencies | minor | [`^4.43.0` -> `^4.44.1`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/webpack/4.43.0/4.44.1)
[whatwg-fetch](https://togithub.com/github/fetch) | devDependencies | minor | [`3.0.0` -> `^3.4.0`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/whatwg-fetch/3.0.0/3.4.0)
[whatwg-fetch](https://togithub.com/github/fetch) | devDependencies | minor | [`^3.1.0` -> `^3.4.0`](https://renovatebot.com/diffs/npm/whatwg-fetch/3.1.0/3.4.0)
